title: Black screen after play button
body: Hi, my friend is having problems with playing league of legends after the latest patch.  Everytime he hits the play button his league client just turns black and it shows nothing.  Please help

replies.body:
Seeing a wall of black after hitting the **play** button is usually caused by the client not being able to load the login server or its assets. To resolve this, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which goes over the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if your friend still has issues after working through that guide.
